medical_history.chief_complaint: Worsening abdominal pain after eating a fatty meal, accompanied by nausea and non-bilious emesis.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient presents with 1 day of worsening abdominal pain, which developed after eating a fatty meal. The pain was exacerbated by movement. Patient denied experiencing fever or chills.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Atrial fibrillation, hypothyroidism, gout, hypertension, lumbar spinal stenosis, T7-T8 meningioma.
